entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
